content.rendered:
I’ve embarked on a portrait-a-day project over on tumblr. Nothing fancy, just a portrait every day, of someone different each time – so no lazy repeats of boyfriends/flatmates etc.

Day 350 will be 31 December 2015, but I’ll probably keep going til day 365 because I’m a bit bloody minded like that.

Here are some of my portraits from the last week.
